messages.message: Hey! I am able to connect, can you try upgrading your cs client?

tried a few things
1. restarting laptop
2. trying on terminal app, iterm2, vscode, cursor terminals
3. removing the cs file from bin, and downloading using https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TI/pages/2107736112/Setting+Up+Your+Crafting+Environment
4. updating OS versions and trying
none of these worked. it seems to be an issue with cli tool on my laptop but unable to troubleshoot it

Can you try a couple things:
1. check the resource usage of your mac
2. Try running the cli commands with `sudo` to rule out a permission related issue.
Meanwhile to unblock yourself, you can open a vscode terminal from the crafting webpage of your sandbox, it won't be cursor but you'll be able to continue working.
cool thanks. this is webIDE right?
issue resolved by deleting the .crafting folder and reinstalling
Oh okay, from your local or the crafting env?
